bike.description: ZR 9000 Alloy™ is lighter than titanium and stronger than steel. Pro Race geometry transfers more power on climbs and descents.

components.description: Fox Float R air spring, 12 click rebound adjust, 32mm EA70 upper tubes, magnesium lowers, 80mm travel

Bontrager Race Disc: Trek Regional Team wheel; Disc-specific rims, welded for huge strength; Bontrager Offset Spoke Bed; Fully serviceable, cartridge bearing hubs; International standard brake rotor, no adapters req.; Race Cro-Moly skewers; 965 g, 28h fro
AHS 1-1/8" alloy cups, semi cartridge, sealed
